title: para deivam
sahitya:
para deivam unaiyanri uNDO pala nOikku marundE en tuyar tIrkkum kAruNya


anupallavi

  haranE sadAshiva paranE varAbhaya karanE
 umaiyAL manamagizh sundaranE emaiyAL maraipugazhum


caraNam    aDi muDiyA kaNDAr Adi madhyAnta rahita shambhO nAmamuDan vaDivamum
 unak-kuNDO mAlayanum vaNangum svayambhO shaDai muDiyaNi
 kailAsa vihArA shankarA tripurahara nirvikAra
